NomaiObject:
<color=orange>Excavation Site</color>
1
CYCAD: Oeno, I hope this scroll reaches you on the quantum shard: I request urgent assistance in locating a native lifeform that has escaped the <color=orange>Sanctuary!!</color>
2
1
CYCAD: I disengaged my voyager stone by accident earlier, causing the quantum shard to slip from my sight.. along with one of the native species resting on it!
3 2
CYCAD: When I regained connection to the voyager, the quantum shard was there, but the lifeform on it was gone!
4
3
CYCAD: We must find it before the <color=orange>Ash Twin Project</color> begins; the <color=orange>Sanctuary</color> is their only protection during the operation of the project!
5
3
OENO: I have delivered the lifeform back into the <color=orange>Sanctuary,</color> Cycad! But why were you unable to use the rule of entanglement to give chase yourself?
6
5
CYCAD: The surface of the planet is never dark enough for one to travel to using the rule of entanglement (unlike these slumbering species), isn't it?
7
6
CYCAD: Oh, but earlier, the quantum shard moved when...
8
7
CYCAD: I see.. A voyager is unable to observe its surroundings on its own. How embarrassing to only now learn how to use the rule of entanglement as a voyager!
SY EX1 3
SY EX3 8
SY EX4 8
